description: The 5th seal broked, only three seals left to achieve the goal of Hagoromo-Gitsune. Yura and Mamiru was under the hard training of Ryuuji while the other onmyoji the guardian of 1, 2 & 3 seals are doing their ultimate plan to kill Hagoromo-Gitsune. After hearing that skilled onmyoji are taken down one by one, Rikuo decide to go back in the Nura Clan together with his new friends they need to meet his night parade of demons and gain powerful comrades that will come him in Kyouto.

titles.title: 羽衣狐[はごろもぎつね]京都全滅侵攻
